title: Four people survive weekend shooting at Brooks Park in Fort Myers
content:
Four people survived a shooting at Brooks Park in Fort Myers on Sunday.
Someone called 911 about 5:30 p.m. to report the shooting at the park just south of Page Field, according to a Lee County Sheriff's Office report.
"Upon arrival, multiple victims with injuries were located withing the park," the report said.
Paramedics took the four people to a hospital.
The sheriff's office has not announced any arrest connected to the shooting.
